casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Mario M. FERRER, Defendant, and
Aegis Security Insurance Company, Surety. No. 313P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 30, 2005. Kenneth P. Anderson, for Aegis Security Ins. Co. Robert E. Wilhoit, Alan V. Pugh, Asheboro, for Randolph Co. Bd. of Education. Prior report: ___ N.C.App. ___, 611 S.E.2d 881 .

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 8th day of June 2005 by Aegis Security Insurance Company in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 30th day of June 2005."
